title: SEARCHING FOR CREATIVE PEOPLE WHO CAN REDESIGN WEBSITE
author: JasonBreakey

comments.content: I think your search engine interpreted the "phile" part of "typophile" incorrectly...
. . . don't I know you from somewhere?

To give you some constructive criticism, Jason, after all this capering from the gang:

The name "Breakey" is no good advertising for someone who aims at bringing together long-lasting partnerships.
